metadata.description: HomeInheriT monetized the home inheritance value of a senior over age 70 for tax-free cash. 1,000,000 Tenant In Common units are issued to the homeowner and bundled into NFT tokens for auction, as the homeowner requests.  At death, the home is sold tax-free and the net sale proceeds are paid to TIC Investors and heirs, per TICs owned. https://www.homeinherit.com/
